tv.generator-info-name: WebGrab+Plus/w MDB & REX Postprocess -- version V5.3.0.0 -- Jan van Straaten

programme.title: JAG: Ghost Ship
programme.desc: Harm and Mac investigate the discovery of a skeleton found hidden aboard a decommissioned aircraft carrier that is being cut up for scrap, and learn it is all that remains of a long-missing JAG officer.(n)

programme.title: JAG: The Court Martial of Sandra Gilbert
programme.sub-title: The Court Martial of Sandra Gilbert
programme.desc: The top female gunship pilot at the Yuma Marine Base is charged with disobeying an order to stop "fraternizing" with her crew chief, a married, enlisted man. Mac is assigned as prosecutor and Harm is set as Susan's defense attorney.(n)

programme.title: JAG: Vanished
programme.desc: Concerns regarding the mysterious disappearance of a fully armed Navy F-14 during a storm lead Harm's investigation to consider such diverse scenarios as pilot suicide, terrorism, the Bermuda Triangle curse, or UFO interference.(n)

programme.title: JAG: King of the Fleas
programme.desc: Having just stabbed a man on a street-corner, Willie, a wheelchair-bound former Vietnam POW arrives at JAG headquarters to report "a 30-year-old murder" which he's just committed. Willie relates that while imprisoned he knew Harm's father.(n)

programme.title: JAG: Against All Enemies
programme.desc: Harm, Mac and Bud board an aircraft carrier in the Sea of Japan to investigate the accidental shooting down of a North Korean civilian airliner by Navy jets.(n)

programme.title: JAG: Impact
programme.desc: Harm and Bud investigate the crash of a Marine helicopter whose dead pilot is being blamed for the incident. They discover the chopper seems to have been hit by some form of UFO. Government security officials want to maintain a cover-up at all costs.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Dirty Seeds, Done Dirt Cheap
programme.desc: When a simple mission to protect a vital seed bank goes awry, Team Scorpion must save Happy, Sylvester and Cabe, who begin suffering from life-threatening, fear-based hallucinations.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Don't Burst My Bubble
programme.desc: Following a severe storm, Happy's friend Ada, who lives in a sterile bubble to protect her compromised immune system, is left with dangerous debris on the verge of puncturing the structure.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Monkey See, Monkey Poo
programme.desc: To stop a dangerous virus from spreading, Team Scorpion must locate a rare endangered monkey in the Amazon that has the antibody for the cure.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Broken Wind
programme.desc: While on a mission to repair a turbine at a wind farm, Team Scorpion must race to save Paige and Happy before the cable holding the gondola they are in snaps and sends them plummeting to the ground.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Rock Block
programme.desc: Team Scorpion must defy the orders of a foreign government after they retrieve an asteroid from space containing DNA strands that could have deadly consequences once exposed.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Heart Breakers, Money Makers
programme.desc: When Andy and Nick’s seizure at an illegal gambling house leads to a suspicious confession, Andy recruits Sam to help figure out who’s lying, why, and where the money is, before anyone gets hurt.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Wanting
programme.desc: When a tenement-building shooting leads to the discovery of an executed gang leader, 15 Division must race to find the killer before a gang war breaks out.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Going Under
programme.desc: When 15 Division goes undercover at a club-land bar that’s a possible hub for illegal handguns, Chris’s erratic behavior and concern for a specific drug dealer make Dov suspicious.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Two Truths and a Lie
programme.desc: As the officers of 15 Division try to hunt down the killer of Brian Gowdy – Andy and Sam go on the road to interview a list of inmates at Millburn Penitentiary.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Deal with the Devil
programme.desc: In the midst of a chaotic day at the station, Oliver prepares Andy to defend herself at Duncan’s dismissal hearing, now happening two hours from now.(n)

programme.title: Most Haunted: Newton House Part 2
programme.desc: Part 2 of this spin-chilling episode. Nursing their wounds from the last episode the team and their celebrity guests ‘Bullet For My Valentine’ carry on.(n)

programme.title: Most Haunted: Royal Court Theatre - Bacup
programme.desc: The world famous ghost hunting team return for a new series and start in a small\ntheatre with a big problem…ghosts.(n)

programme.title: Most Haunted: Saltmarshe Hall Part 1
programme.desc: Saltmarshe Hall is a mysterious, haunted house of complete contrasts. Beneath the property lies a network of corridors and cellar rooms and the abandoned North Wing has sat empty for over 70 years,.(n)

programme.title: Most Haunted: Saltmarshe Hall Part 2
programme.desc: Saltmarshe Hall is a mysterious, haunted house of complete contrasts. Beneath the property lies a network of corridors and cellar rooms and the abandoned North Wing has sat empty for over 70 years,.(n)

programme.title: NEW & EXCLUSIVE! Most Haunted
programme.desc: An all but deserted manor house that boasts murder, death and intrigue among its history becomes the setting for one of the most intriguing investigation to date. The team are showered with object that appear to land in the same way.(n)

programme.title: NEW & EXCLUSIVE! Most Haunted
programme.desc: Yvette and team are put to the test as activity seems to be all around them, something is following them but who or what. Could it be the spirit of a man they connect who died near the house over 100 years ago?(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Inhuman Entity
programme.desc: The TAPS team answers a call from a family in Blackstone, Massachusetts being plagued by a demonic entity.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: All Aboard the Ghost Train
programme.desc: This historic roundhouse and rail yard is connected to more that just old trains. The frightening remnants of a serial killer, horrific accidents and one of the worst train crashes have two people questioning strange encounters.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: All Ghosts On Deck
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, TAPS travels to Louisville, Kentucky to investigate one of the oldest operating steamboats in the United States, The Belle of Louisville.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Frozen in Fear
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, TAPS heads to Mission Point Resort on Mackinac Island. Constructed in the 1950's as a summer destination, it becomes nearly deserted in the winter time, and perfect for the team to investigate.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: The Bloodiest 47 Acres
programme.desc: TAPS is called out to Jefferson City, Missouri, to investigate the notorious Missouri State Penitentiary. A prison that was once named one of the most violent prisons in America.Riots, stabbings and executions left thousands dead over the years.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters
programme.desc: Despite mysterious and unnerving warnings from locals, the Ghost Hunters face their fears and stay on mission: to help people confront terrifying paranormal encounters that have shaken them to their core.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: Cui Bono
programme.desc: Beka's uncle runs for office in the New Commonwealth, but an assassination attempt causes the crew to act as his security.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: The Lone and Level Sands
programme.desc: When the Andromeda is attacked by space pirates, they are rescued by a long-lost spaceship from Earth.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: The crew discovers that a rogue planet, Marduk, has been creating weapons of mass destruction.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: The Leper's Kiss
programme.desc: A hitman by the name of the Leper is targeting the leaders of the New Commonwealth.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: For Whom the Bell Tolls
programme.desc: The Andromeda is haunted by a mysterious creature that comes aboard during a solar storm.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: And Your Heart Will Fly Away
programme.sub-title: And Your Heart Will Fly Away
programme.desc: When a long lost love returns, Tyr disappears from the ship to protect her from an assassin.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.89
programme.desc: Three teenagers conspire to steal 8,000 dollars from a senior citizen to buy new equipment for their band; one of the thieves is the woman’s own grandson/The proceeds from selling an engagement ring on eBay divides ex- lovers.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.11
programme.desc: A daycare provider sues for slander after parents claim she was unlicensed, negligent, and had alcohol on the premises/Two boxers and a German Shepherd allegedly jump on a car and scratch the paint; ex-friends fight over damages.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.30
programme.desc: Man returns to estranged wife after girlfriend allegedly hires divorce attorney/Man sues cousin for damaging and disposing of property post-eviction from shared home.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.243
programme.desc: A young woman and her father sue her ex-boyfriend, arrested for unpaid child support, for bail money and security deposit return. Another woman, 20, sues her ex for totaling her 2006 Ford Focus; he countersues for unpaid rent and a stolen passport.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.147
programme.desc: Teen accused of car vandalism; alleges pepper spray incident. Teen uses loan for stepfather's rims; sues for repayment and totaled car balance.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.113
programme.desc: Teen cosmetologist accuses ex-lover of breaking phone/Snowboard instructor sues co-worker for slope collision injuries.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.105
programme.desc: Ex-friends dispute over money after unauthorized shower photos and drug possession arrest/Woman sues ex-friend for unpaid BMW balance; friend claims she donated car before paying off.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.92
programme.desc: Ex-lovers dispute loan for motorcycle repair trade school, laptop cost, and apartment repairs. Man sues friend for car damage; she admits drinking and letting someone else drive it.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.257
programme.desc: Road rage after an argument over a man leaves former friends fighting over damages from a car accident.\t\t\t\r\nA personal assistant is accused of violent behavior after her decision to quit her job and sue her former employer.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.173
programme.desc:
A man trades cars with his girlfriend and her mother, wrecks their			
vehicle, then wants to trade back without repairing it.			
A personal trailer is accused of inappropriate behavior by a female			
client who sues for a refund.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.221
programme.desc: An 8-year-old boy calls his father after an argument with his mother, leading to a fight and damaged property. A woman sues her ex-boyfriend for stealing her quad runner and wrecking her car; he alleges harassment.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: Tension mounts between two chefs competing in a challenge. Drew Lachey, John O'Hurley, Tom Green, Melinda Clarke, Chris `Kid' Reid and Kristy Swanson attend the dinner service.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: Each team is asked to create two appetisers and an entrée for a US Marine's welcome home party. Ramsay boils over when one team sends out cold food during the dinner service.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The contestants must create a three-course meal with only 700 calories. Olympic athlete Annett Davis teaches the winning team how to play volleyball at the beach and a chef is taken to the emergency room.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The chefs roll dice to determine which ingredients they will use in a dish and one team continues to make the same mistakes while another gets tired of a bossy teammate.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The chefs compete in a blind taste-test challenge. One team serves raw meat and the other team runs out of potatoes.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Sam Taylor, the President & CEO of Oriental Trading Company, the largest retailer of party supplies in the United States, is going undercover in hopes of finding that the company’s mission of “selling fun.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Jane Riddell, chief operating officer of GoodLife Fitness, disguises herself as a Zumba-instructor trainee, a maintenance worker and a salesperson.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: The Victorian Order of Nurses takes the pressure off hospitals by providing care for people in their own homes. Hundreds of rival companies compete for cash and customers.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Stacey Mowbray, CEO of Canada’s largest specialty coffee company goes undercover and gets into the grind serving lattes to get an edge on customer service and revive her connection with frontline workers.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Toronto Transit Commission (TTC) City Councillor and TTC Chair Karen Stintz goes undercover inside the country's largest mass transit system to get her hands dirty with some of the toughest and grittiest jobs.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: Don't Spray Me with That
programme.desc: First, Sonia and Froy repossess an experimental concept motorcycle from a hose-wielding yuppie. Then, Froy and Sonia head to a casting agency to repossess a car from a two-faced receptionist with a special talent for four-letter words.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: There Was an Accident
programme.desc: First, Sonia and Froy head to a supermarket to repossess a Mitsubishi from a truant bagboy, but they'll also have to contend with a furious shopper. Then, Matt and Froy find their car, but it's been heavily vandalized.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: Go Kart Them Away
programme.desc: First, Matt and Froy repossess a car from a cheating husband who's shacked up at a nearby motel. His wife probably isn't going to be too happy to hear about this. Then, Sonia and Lyndah crash a high school reunion to confront an over-the-hill jock.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Jen at Work
programme.desc: Adam suggests that Jen do some freelance graphic design work for the company but Russell isn't crazy about the idea.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Optimal Male
programme.desc: Jeff's drive to be labeled an 'optimal male' on his life-insurance physical leads him to some extreme behavior, while Adam's over-friendliness with an ex-girlfriend unsettles Jennifer.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Russell's Father's Son
programme.desc: Russell puts on a show to impress his father when he comes to town, but both he and Adam learn the meaning of a parent's tough love. Meanwhile, an 'accident' in their apartment forces Adam and Jennifer to invade Audrey and Jeff's bathroom.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Buyer's Remorse
programme.desc: Jennifer and Adam attempt to practice fiscal responsibility as they consider buying their apartment. Audrey and Jeff offer to write their letter of recommendation, but end up making matters worse when they have a run-in with the landlady.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Pimp My Bride
programme.desc: Russell reluctantly agrees to host a photo shoot in his apartment for Audrey's magazine, with the hope of landing a date with a hot model. Adam steps in to play the groom in Audrey's wedding-themed shoot.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Jeff’s New Friend
programme.desc: Jeff is surprised when Audrey informs him that the new friend he made at the gym is gay. Meanwhile, Russell worries the young woman he's dating might be his daughter.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Voluntary Commitment
programme.desc: After a long line of female assistants, Russell learns that having a male assistant can be very advantageous. Meanwhile, after volunteering to read to the elderly, Audrey makes a bet with Jeff that she can commit to finishing a project.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Dad's Visit
programme.desc: Much to Audrey's dismay, Jeff's chauvinist father, who expects Audrey to wait on him hand and foot, extends his visit after spraining his ankle. Meanwhile, Russell has a one-night stand with a woman who won't leave his apartment.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Russell's Secret
programme.desc: Audrey discovers that Russell is a closeted fan of Broadway musicals, a fact she promises to keep secret in exchange for free theater tickets. Meanwhile, Adam and Jennifer take dancing lessons in preparation for their wedding.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Twice
programme.desc: When Audrey becomes jealous of a pregnant co-worker, she inadvertently convinces her colleagues that she has a bundle of joy on the way too.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Lyin' King
programme.desc: Things quickly get complicated when Audrey and Jeff decide to ditch a dinner date with Jennifer and Adam in order to attend Brad and Jackie's exclusive, celebrity packed party.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Bounty Boot Camp
programme.desc: Jim is a bondsman and longtime friend of Dog. Jim's son has just started in the family business. Today, Jim has asked Dog to track down a potentially dangerous fugitive, and take his son along for some training with the best in the world.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Friends and Neighbors
programme.desc: Dog and his posse head to Colorado for a special mission, to catch Marco, an alleged drug dealer. It's been ten months since Marco went on the lam, and his bondsman stands to lose his family business if Marco is not caught.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: The Set-Up
programme.desc: The trail is hot and the stakes is high for Dog and the posse. The "Big Fish" in this case is Marco, an alleged drug dealer with a big bond. But a major key to catching him is Elizabeth, who is also a fugitive from the law.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: The Searchers
programme.desc: Dog is still on the search for the elusive fugitive, Marco. Dog has been tracking him across Colorado, from Grand Junction to Denver, and now a hot tip that a long time associate of his is hiding in Pueblo sends the team racing south.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Buddha's Delight
programme.desc: Dog and the posse travel to the Big Island to help Leland track down a small-time Bonnie and Clyde couple. Their crime: theft, including allegedly stealing a pair of Buddha statues for resale.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Three's Company
programme.desc: This fugitive is hard to pin down in Honolulu's downtown district, moving from hostel to hotel to apartment high-rise. But as the hunt evolves, Dog discovers that this alleged burglar isn't the only family member wanted by the law.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Governor's Travels
programme.desc: When the Governor of Louisiana announces that he will be coming to Duck Commander to present Willie with a commerce award, John Luke volunteers to give the introduction speech.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Quack and Gown
programme.desc: With Reed's graduation day approaching, Jase decides to take Reed frog hunting the night before, like he did on the day of his own graduation. Willie and Si join in, and Jase tries to keep them from imparting their "college advice" on Reed.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Hands on a Woodchipper
programme.desc: When Willie agrees to sponsor Mountain Man's radio contest, a "Hands on a Hardbody" competition, he somehow finds himself competing against Si for Mountain Man's last minute prize: a woodchipper.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Quack Draft
programme.desc: When the Robertsons participate in the West Monroe Fire Department pancake breakfast, the firemen invite Willie and his brothers to train with the department for the day. Meanwhile, Phil and Si accompany Miss Kay on a trip to visit a family grave.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Brand of Brothers
programme.desc: When Willie contemplates re-branding the Duck Commander image, Jase takes issue with having an outsider design their image, so he and the guys create their own new logo and business cards. Meanwhile, Willie and Phil help Bella with her science project.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: De-Bug Life
programme.desc: The guys realize it is time for the annual cleaning of the duck blinds when they come across a gator using one as a home. Meanwhile, while the kids are running the church car wash, Si and Willie disagree on the best way to draw in customers.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Men vs. Wild
programme.desc: Brotherly competition is taken to a whole new level when Jase and Willie challenge Alan and Jep to a survival race through the woods on Phil's property. Meanwhile, Si is interested in finding a new hobby when he sees Kay cutting coupons.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Return of the Beavers
programme.desc: When Phil discovers more beaver activity on the Robertson land, he recruits Jase, Jep, and Si to get rid of them. Meanwhile, Willie and Korie bring Bella to her first day of karate practice.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: Stumped on a way to celebrate Willie's birthday, Korie enlists the guys' help and Jase takes the reigns in planning a trip to the lake where Phil and Kay used to live. Meanwhile, the women realize a raccoon is inside the lake house.(n)

programme.title: The Four Warriors
programme.desc: Travelling home, four soldiers discover a village gripped by fear, as residents are abducted by unknown predators. These warriors set out to rescue them and destroy what lurks outside the village.(n)

programme.title: Encounter
programme.desc: A group of friends uncover an otherworldly object in a rural field, which they soon discover holds greater secrets than they could imagine.(n)

programme.title: Space Truckers
programme.desc: A space trucker and his cute fiancee are on their way from a space station to Earth with an unknown cargo. When space pirates hijack them, 5000 disintegrator robots are found in the cargo.(n)

programme.title: The Forbidden Kingdom
programme.desc: Two highly skilled martial arts warriors must train an American teen so that he is able to fight a centuries old battle to free the Monkey King.(n)

programme.title: Deepwater Horizon
programme.desc: A dramatization of the April 2010 disaster, when an oil well called Deepwater Horizon exploded causing the worst spill in US history.(n)

programme.title: Jackie Brown
programme.desc: Writer and director Quentin Tarantino adapts Elmore Leonard's bestseller RUM PUNCH in a stylish homage to 1970s exploitation movies with six players on the trail of a half-million dollars in cash.(n)

programme.title: The Forbidden Kingdom
programme.desc: Two highly skilled martial arts warriors must train an American teen so that he is able to fight a centuries old battle to free the Monkey King.(n)

programme.title: Deepwater Horizon
programme.desc: A dramatization of the April 2010 disaster, when an oil well called Deepwater Horizon exploded causing the worst spill in US history.(n)

programme.title: Jackie Brown
programme.desc: Writer and director Quentin Tarantino adapts Elmore Leonard's bestseller RUM PUNCH in a stylish homage to 1970s exploitation movies with six players on the trail of a half-million dollars in cash.(n)

programme.title: The Forbidden Kingdom
programme.desc: Two highly skilled martial arts warriors must train an American teen so that he is able to fight a centuries old battle to free the Monkey King.(n)

programme.title: Deepwater Horizon
programme.desc: A dramatization of the April 2010 disaster, when an oil well called Deepwater Horizon exploded causing the worst spill in US history.(n)

programme.title: Jackie Brown
programme.desc: Writer and director Quentin Tarantino adapts Elmore Leonard's bestseller RUM PUNCH in a stylish homage to 1970s exploitation movies with six players on the trail of a half-million dollars in cash.(n)

programme.title: Guardians of the Tomb
programme.desc: In a quest to find a lost colleague, a team of scientists find themselves deep underground in an ancient labyrinth, while trying to unearth a secret that has been buried for centuries.(n)

programme.title: Jack Hunter: And The Star of Heaven
programme.desc: Jack Hunter realizes the pharaoh's tomb being empty except for a Roman coin means the treasure was looted to Rome but later probably transferred the the new, Byzantine capital, Constantinople.(n)

programme.title: Kickboxer
programme.desc: When kickboxing champ Eric Sloane is crippled in the ring by the evil Tong Po, Eric's younger brother, Kurt, seeks vengeance.(n)

programme.title: The Santa Trap
programme.desc: Santa Claus winds up in jail after a 7-year-old sets a trap in order to prove his existence to her family.(n)

programme.title: Christmas Child
programme.desc: A life-sized nativity leads a man to learn about his past and lost family.(n)

programme.title: Almost Christmas
programme.desc: Rene and Dennis try one last con in this crazy Christmas comedy starring Paul Rudd, Paul Giamatti and Sally Hawkins.(n)

programme.title: Secret Liaison
programme.desc: One time top public defender returns to LA to try to stop her sister from going to jail for first degree murder, but Samantha also comes face to face with the past she ran away from.(n)

programme.title: Love You To Death
programme.desc: Talented attorney Yasmine Winter freezes in court, and her mistake allows a murderer go free. Her boss orders her to take a sabbatical but secretly, Yasmine plans to use the time away to rebuild the case she just lost.(n)

programme.title: Mary Higgins Clark
programme.sub-title: Mary Higgins Clark: Try To Remember
programme.desc: Lisa's return to her hometown to join the local police force coincides with the release of a man, Jake, who killed her best friend 15 years earlier. Soon, people start dying mysterious deaths and the investigation points to Jake as prime suspect.(n)

programme.title: No Good Deed
programme.desc: Based on a story of the same name by Dashiell Hammett, the crime thriller The House on Turk Street was directed by veteran filmmaker Bob Rafelson.(n)

programme.title: Good Morning, Killer
programme.desc: An FBI agent (Catherine Bell) tracks a kidnapper while developing a rapport with his latest victim.(n)

programme.title: The Bleeder
programme.desc: Liquor salesman and part-time prizefighter Chuck Wepner gets the chance to take on Muhammad Ali in a highly publicized title fight, launching him to sudden fame.(n)

programme.title: Ali
programme.desc: Muhammad Ali (Will Smith) battles Sonny Liston, Joe Frazier and George Foreman and raises controversy outside the ring.(n)

programme.title: The Life and Legend of Wyatt Earp: Johnny Ringo's Girl
programme.desc: Ringo's girlfriend is trying to get him to turn his life around, so he goes to Old Man Clanton and tells him he wants to leave the gang.(n)

programme.title: The Life and Legend of Wyatt Earp: Miss Sadie
programme.desc: The wife of a wounded outlaw takes him to Tombstone for medical attention as he has decided to go straight. Earp learns who he is but doesn't trust him.(n)

programme.title: The Life and Legend of Wyatt Earp: Winning Streak
programme.desc: Morgan Earp has been having a streak of good luck in Tombstone's gambling houses but Wyatt wants to get him to quit while he's still ahead and return to his old self.(n)

programme.title: The Life and Legend of Wyatt Earp: Billy Bucket, Incorporated
programme.desc: An old prospector stumbles into a saloon saying he has been robbed and murdered. He is suffering from a shot that creased his head and mumbling that he had $50,000 in gold stolen from him.(n)

programme.title: The Life and Legend of Wyatt Earp: Horse Thief
programme.desc: Wyatt jails the McLowery brothers for robbery. Soon afterwards, however, he is enraged to learn that, because the McLowerys work for Old Man Clanton, they've been released by Sheriff Behan.(n)

programme.title: The Life and Legend of Wyatt Earp: Terror in the Desert
programme.desc: Earp meets the wife of a man who was convicted of theft and sentenced to Yuma prison where escaped prisoners are tracked and killed by Apaches for the reward.(n)

programme.title: A Soldier's Revenge
programme.desc: Frank Connor is a Civil War hero turned bounty hunter. When two children turn up on his doorstep, desperate for his help to find their missing mother, Frank finds he must face up to his past and the notorious Major with whom he has an old score to settle.(n)

programme.title: Gracie
programme.desc: A teenager faces an uphill battle when she fights to give women the opportunity to play competitive soccer.(n)

programme.title: The Great Alaskan Race
programme.desc: In this incredible true story, widowed father Leonhard travels 700 miles across treacherous ice with only his sled dogs for company, to deliver the anti-toxin to the hospital, after a deadly diphtheria outbreak hits the small Alaskan town of Nome in 1925.(n)

programme.title: A.R.C.H.I.E: A.R.C.H.I.E
programme.desc: Isabel has recently lost her parents in a car accident. Feeling alone and friendless, she befriends a stray robot dog named A.R.C.H.I.E. who can talk, run at blinding speed and has super strength and x-ray vision and they become fast friends.(n)

programme.title: Bandidas
programme.desc: In turn-of-the-century Mexico, two very different women become a bank-robbing duo in an effort to combat a ruthless enforcer terrorizing their town.(n)

programme.title: Groomzilla
programme.desc: A woman is surprised and dismayed when her fiance takes the planning of their wedding too seriously.(n)

programme.title: Your Highness
programme.desc: When Prince Fabious's bride is kidnapped, he goes on a quest to rescue her... accompanied by his lazy useless brother Thadeous.(n)

programme.title: Death Line
programme.desc: The discovery of a dying man by two students at Russell Square tube station triggers a hunt for cannibals preying on passengers.(n)

programme.title: The Beast Must Die
programme.desc: A wealthy hunter invites a group of people to his fortified mansion hoping to trap the werewolf among them.(n)

programme.title: Penny and the Pownall Case
programme.desc: A glamour model helps Scotland Yard to catch a criminal gang.(n)

programme.title: Take My Life
programme.desc: When her husband is wrongly accused of murder, an opera singer sets out to find the real culprit.(n)

programme.title: Quantum Leap
programme.desc: Sam (Scott Bakula) becomes a small-time detective in 1953 who is suspected of murdering his partner. With Dean Stockwell.(n)

programme.title: Quantum Leap
programme.desc: Sam (Scott Bakula) jumps into the life of a ``ghostbuster'' who has been asked to silence the other-world murmurings of a dead romance novelist. Deborah Pratt guest stars. With Dean Stockwell.(n)

programme.title: Quantum Leap
programme.desc: Sam (Scott Bakula) assumes the identity of a newlywed New York policeman who is pursued by his bride's jealous ex-husband. With Dean Stockwell.(n)

programme.title: Quantum Leap
programme.desc: Sam Beckett remembers his own relationship with his older brother when Sam becomes a stuntman who must protect his younger brother from being killed while doing a stunt on a low-budget feature.(n)

programme.title: Quantum Leap
programme.desc: Sam (Scott Bakula) becomes a Pacific sailor returning from duty in 1953 with a Japanese war bride (Leila Hee Olsen) -- much to the dismay of his friends and family. With Dean Stockwell.(n)

programme.title: Quantum Leap
programme.desc: Sam (Scott Bakula) leaps into the life of a blind concert pianist in 1964 who must prevent the death of a young woman. Also stars Dean Stockwell.(n)

programme.title: Relic Hunter: Transformation
programme.desc: Sydney, Nigel and Derek Lloyd go to the Peruvian jungle to look for the Paracelsus scrolls which contain the formula for turning lead into gold.(n)

programme.title: Relic Hunter: Flag Day
programme.desc: Sydney and Nigel head to Larivee, California to find the Pioneer's Bear Flag.(n)

programme.title: Relic Hunter: Emperor's Bride
programme.desc: Sydney and Nigel are in Moose Bay, Alaska looking for the white jade sarcophagus of a Chinese Empress. Sydney runs into fellow relic hunters Dallas Carter and Kurt Reiner.(n)

programme.title: Relic Hunter: Diamond in the Rough
programme.desc: Sydney, Nigel and rival relic hunter Kurt Reiner attempt to find the lost baseball glove of Jimmy Jonesboro.(n)

programme.title: New Twilight Zone: Her Pilgrim Soul/I of Newton
programme.desc: Two scientists named Kevin and Daniel are experimenting with a holographic device/ A mathematics professor accidentally makes a bargain with the devil and has to figure a way out.(n)

programme.title: New Twilight Zone: Shatterday/A Little Peace and Quiet
programme.desc: A man named Peter Jay Novins accidentally dials his home phone number, and it's answered by Peter Jay Novins/A harried housewife finds a medallion that gives her the power to freeze time.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Ton's Hot Commodity
programme.desc: Allen is late to the auction, leaving Ton to battle a feisty female auction buyer on his own! The guys find a fully functional flamethrower and a rare hand-carved bow and arrow set from South America!(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Ton's Driller Instinct
programme.desc: Ton & Allen encounter aggressive outdoorsmen in the Alaskan wilderness. The guys discover an 8-wheeled ATV that travels on both land & water and an air percussion hammer that can drill through solid rock!(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Strat'ed for Cash
programme.desc: On a limited budget in the historic L.A. neighborhood of West Adams, Allen and Ton still win three lockers and find a Maui Blue Fender Stratocaster and a 1930s Schwinn bike.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Great American Cashtime
programme.desc: Rare 1950s Master Pitch baseball machine; 1980s Jaws of Life tool used by rescuers to pry open cars.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Sin City Shootout
programme.desc: 1953 Chevy-inspired bumper car; scores of M16 30-round magazines; reproduction 1940s boardwalk photobooth; aerosol-powered spud gun potato launchers.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Weapons of Past Destruction
programme.desc: Knowing that Hollywood auctions are hit-and-miss, Allen and Ton buy inexpensive lockers that contain a polygraph machine, a samurai sword and a pair of Civil War shotguns.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: The Dallas Mavericks
programme.desc: Military-grade Tomahawk cruise missile jet engine; century-old handcrafted wild west cowboy saddle; 1960s high roller's gold money.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Knuckle Dust
programme.desc: 1870s French Jarre Dolne Knuckle Duster revolver-knife-brass knuckle combo, a rare original George Rodrigue "Blue Dog" screenprint and a 1980 autographed Raging Bull movie poster.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: The Big Score
programme.desc: At a climate-controlled storage facility in downtown L.A., Allen and Ton's locker wins score them an antique cash register and a German H&K pistol prized by collectors.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Night of the Digging Dead
programme.desc: A custom-built shark cage; 1900s pathologist's dissection toolkit; 1940s embalming pump and one of the first electric bone saws.(n)
